DbSql.sql: select * from(select TNAME name,'dbo' cuser,DECODE(TABTYPE,'TABLE','U',TABTYPE) type,'' dates,tc.comments from tab t,user_tab_comments tc where TABTYPE='TABLE' AND t.tname=tc.table_name)

SELECT COLUMN_ID AS COLORDER, T.TABLE_NAME AS TABLENAME, T.COLUMN_NAME AS COLUMNNAME, DATA_TYPE AS TYPENAME, DATA_LENGTH AS LENGTH, DATA_PRECISION AS PRECI, DATA_SCALE AS SCALE, '' AS ISIDENTITY, (SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*), 0, 'N', 'Y') FROM USER_CONSTRAINTS A, USER_CONS_COLUMNS B WHERE A.CONSTRAINT_NAME = B.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND A.TABLE_NAME = T.TABLE_NAME AND B.COLUMN_NAME = T.COLUMN_NAME AND A.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P') AS ISPK, NULLABLE AS CISNULL, DATA_DEFAULT AS DEFAULTVAL, COL.COMMENTS AS DETEXT, RF.RFTABLE, RF.RFCOLUMN FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS T, USER_COL_COMMENTS COL, (SELECT FC.COLUMN_NAME, CC.TABLE_NAME RFTABLE, CC.COLUMN_NAME RFCOLUMN FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS FC, USER_CONSTRAINTS FT, USER_CONS_COLUMNS CC,USER_CONSTRAINTS CT WHERE FT.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND FC.CONSTRAINT_NAME = FT.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND CT.CONSTRAINT_NAME = FT.R_CONSTRAINT_NAME AND CT.CONSTRAINT_NAME = CC.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND CC.POSITION = FC.POSITION) RF WHERE T.TABLE_NAME = COL.TABLE_NAME AND T.COLUMN_NAME = COL.COLUMN_NAME AND T.COLUMN_NAME = RF.COLUMN_NAME(+) ORDER BY COLUMN_ID
